title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-3.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-3.1 - General

State Regulations

Close coordination should be maintained with the
construction advisor so that as much advance information as possible is
obtained concerning the anticipated date of initial occupancy. Certain items
must be completed by the authority before initial occupancy can take place. Following is a check list of the most urgent of these items; it is to serve as
a guide and should not be considered as all inclusive. The Division of Housing
will extend every possible assistance when called upon but the basic
responsibility for the accomplishment of these items rests with the local
authority and its employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
